All rights reserved. 1 Chapter 1. Introduction and overview The IBM Z platform is recognized for its long-standing commitment to delivering best-of-breed security, resiliency, performance, and scalability. IBM Z platform is relied on for mission-critical workloads and as an essential element of hybrid cloud infrastructures. This IBM® Redbooks® publication introduces the latest members of the IBM Z family, available in two new configuration options:  IBM z16 A02  IBM z16 AGZ The IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ align with the American Society of Heating, Refrigerating, and Air-Conditioning Engineers (ASHRAE) Class A3 data center guidelines and is available in two different configuration options:  The IBM z16 A02 is built with an IBM 19-inch format single
